name: Five Nights In Anime: On The Night
name_original: Five Nights In Anime: On The Night
description:
Five Nights In Anime: On The Night. the game is still in beta phase and updating with time

Five Nights In Anime on the night. is a first person horror game with cally3D animatronics. your goal is to spend all the nights without the animatronic catching you during 23:00 at night and finish the game at 06:00 in the morning. enjoy and play
